content.question: The study of political culture involves attempting to explain political behavior by

choices.label: explaining the structures and institutions of various governments
identifying the beliefs, attitudes, and values of citizens
examining the historical conflicts between countries
assessing the character of political leaders
examining its relationship to economic interdependence

content.answer: identifying the beliefs, attitudes, and values of citizens

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
